EmailTemplate.name: 09: F/U 03: Follow Up to My Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up to my Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.First_Name__c},
I am checking in as it has been a little while since we last spoke. Please let me know when we can connect to finalize the tools you'd like to use this year to drive referral activity and make an impact on client acquisition.
The Package you were considering can be found here: (AM Insert Proposal Link)
Please let me know of a better time to connect with you so I can ensure you are well taken care of.
Thank you,
{!User.Name} Account Manager Five Star Professional {!User.Phone} {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
